general.name: eFEDS_Main_speccomp
general.short: replace-me - with a short one sentence summary of file
general.description: replace-me - with a longer description of the data product

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: replace-me - with $BHM_EFEDS_SPECCOMP/[V_SPECCOMP]/eFEDS_Main_speccomp-[V_SPECCOMP].fits or eFEDS_Main_speccomp-v1.4.3.fits but with regex pattern matches
general.generated_by: replace-me - with the name(s) of any git or svn product(s) that produces this product.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.value: Dummy header; see following table extension

ERO_Name.name: ERO_NAME
ERO_Name.description: From Brunner+22, eROSITA official source Name

ERO_ID_SRC.name: ERO_ID_SRC
ERO_ID_SRC.description: From Brunner+22, ID of eROSITA source in the Main Sample

ERO_RA_CORR.name: ERO_RA_CORR
ERO_RA_CORR.description: From Brunner+22, J2000 Right Ascension of eROSITA source (corrected)

ERO_DEC_CORR.name: ERO_DEC_CORR
ERO_DEC_CORR.description: From Brunner+22, J2000 Declination of eROSITA source (corrected)

ERO_ML_FLUX_ERR.name: ERO_ML_FLUX_ERR
ERO_ML_FLUX_ERR.description: From Brunner+22, 0.2-2.3 keV source flux error (1 sigma)

ERO_DET_LIKE.name: ERO_DET_LIKE
ERO_DET_LIKE.description: From Brunner+22, 0.2-2.3 keV detection likelihood via PSF-fitting

CTP_LS8_UNIQUE_OBJID.name: CTP_LS8_UNIQUE_OBJID
CTP_LS8_UNIQUE_OBJID.description: From Salvato+22, LS8 unique id for ctp to the eROSITA source

CTP_LS8_RA.name: CTP_LS8_RA
CTP_LS8_RA.description: From Salvato+22, Right Ascension of the LS8 counterpart

CTP_LS8_DEC.name: CTP_LS8_DEC
CTP_LS8_DEC.description: From Salvato+22, Declination of the best LS8 counterpart

Dist_CTP_LS8_ERO.name: DIST_CTP_LS8_ERO
Dist_CTP_LS8_ERO.description: From Salvato+22, Separation between ctp and eROSITA position

LS_ID.name: LS_ID
LS_ID.description: Unique ID of lsdr9 photometric object labelled with spec-z

LS_RA.name: LS_RA
LS_RA.description: Coordinate from lsdr9 at epoch LS9_EPOCH

LS_DEC.name: LS_DEC
LS_DEC.description: Coordinate from lsdr9 at epoch LS9_EPOCH

LS_MAG_G.name: LS_MAG_G
LS_MAG_G.description: DECam g-band model magnitude from lsdr9, AB

LS_MAG_R.name: LS_MAG_R
LS_MAG_R.description: DECam r-band model magnitude from lsdr9, AB

LS_MAG_Z.name: LS_MAG_Z
LS_MAG_Z.description: DECam z-band model magnitude from lsdr9, AB

SPECZ_N.name: SPECZ_N
SPECZ_N.description: Total number of spec-z associated with this lsdr9 object

SPECZ_RAJ2000.name: SPECZ_RAJ2000
SPECZ_RAJ2000.description: Coordinate of spec-z, propagated if necessary to epoch J2000

SPECZ_DEJ2000.name: SPECZ_DEJ2000
SPECZ_DEJ2000.description: Coordinate of spec-z, propagated if necessary to epoch J2000

SPECZ_NSEL.name: SPECZ_NSEL
SPECZ_NSEL.description: Number of spec-z selected to inform result for this object

SPECZ_REDSHIFT.name: SPECZ_REDSHIFT
SPECZ_REDSHIFT.description: Final redshift determined for this object

SPECZ_NORMQ.name: SPECZ_NORMQ
SPECZ_NORMQ.description: Final normalised redshift quality associated with this object

SPECZ_NORMC.name: SPECZ_NORMC
SPECZ_NORMC.description: Final normlised classfication determined for this object

SPECZ_HASVI.name: SPECZ_HASVI
SPECZ_HASVI.description: True if best spec-z for this object has a visual inspection

SPECZ_CATCODE.name: SPECZ_CATCODE
SPECZ_CATCODE.description: Catalogue code of best spec-z for this object

SPECZ_BITMASK.name: SPECZ_BITMASK
SPECZ_BITMASK.description: Bitmask encoding catalogues containing spec-z for this object

SPECZ_SEL_BITMASK.name: SPECZ_SEL_BITMASK
SPECZ_SEL_BITMASK.description: Bitmask encoding catalogues containing informative spec-z for object

SPECZ_FLAGS.name: SPECZ_FLAGS
SPECZ_FLAGS.description: Bitmask encoding quality flags for this object

SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MAX.name: SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MAX
SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MAX.description: Highest NORMQ of informative spec-z for this object

SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MEAN.name: SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MEAN
SPECZ_SEL_NORMQ_MEAN.description: Mean NORMQ of informative spec-z for this object

SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEAN.name: SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEAN
SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEAN.description: Mean REDSHIFT of informative spec-z for this object

SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEDIAN.name: SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEDIAN
SPECZ_SEL_Z_MEDIAN.description: Median REDSHIFT of informative spec-z for this object

SPECZ_SEL_Z_STDDEV.name: SPECZ_SEL_Z_STDDEV
SPECZ_SEL_Z_STDDEV.description: Standard deviation of REDSHIFTs for informative spec-z for object

SPECZ_ORIG_RA.name: SPECZ_ORIG_RA
SPECZ_ORIG_RA.description: Coordinate associated with individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_DEC.name: SPECZ_ORIG_DEC
SPECZ_ORIG_DEC.description: Coordinate associated with individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_POS_EPOCH.name: SPECZ_ORIG_POS_EPOCH
SPECZ_ORIG_POS_EPOCH.description: Coordinate epoch associated with individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_LS_SEP.name: SPECZ_ORIG_LS_SEP
SPECZ_ORIG_LS_SEP.description: Distance from spec-z to lsdr9 photometric ctp (corrected for pm)

SPECZ_ORIG_LS_GT1CTP.name: SPECZ_ORIG_LS_GT1CTP
SPECZ_ORIG_LS_GT1CTP.description: Can spec-z be associated with >1 possible lsdr9 counterpart?

SPECZ_ORIG_LS_CTP_RANK.name: SPECZ_ORIG_LS_CTP_RANK
SPECZ_ORIG_LS_CTP_RANK.description: Rank of ctp out of all possibilities for this spec-z (1=closest)

SPECZ_ORIG_ID.name: SPECZ_ORIG_ID
SPECZ_ORIG_ID.description: Orig. value of ID of individual spec-z measurement (as a string)

SPECZ_ORIG_REDSHIFT.name: SPECZ_ORIG_REDSHIFT
SPECZ_ORIG_REDSHIFT.description: Orig. redshift value of individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_QUAL.name: SPECZ_ORIG_QUAL
SPECZ_ORIG_QUAL.description: Orig. redshift quality value of individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_NORMQ.name: SPECZ_ORIG_NORMQ
SPECZ_ORIG_NORMQ.description: Orig. redshift quality of individual spec-z measurement - normalised

SPECZ_ORIG_CLASS.name: SPECZ_ORIG_CLASS
SPECZ_ORIG_CLASS.description: Orig. classification label of individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_ORIG_HASVI.name: SPECZ_ORIG_HASVI
SPECZ_ORIG_HASVI.description: True if individual spec-z has a visual inspection from our team

SPECZ_ORIG_NORMC.name: SPECZ_ORIG_NORMC
SPECZ_ORIG_NORMC.description: Normalised classification code of individual spec-z measurement

SPECZ_RA_USED.name: SPECZ_RA_USED
SPECZ_RA_USED.description: Adopted coordinate of specz when matching to Salvato+22 counterpart

SPECZ_DEC_USED.name: SPECZ_DEC_USED
SPECZ_DEC_USED.description: Adopted coordinate of specz when matching to Salvato+22 counterpart

has_specz.name: HAS_SPECZ
has_specz.description: Does this Salvato+22 counterpart have a spec-z?

has_informative_specz.name: HAS_INFORMATIVE_SPECZ
has_informative_specz.description: Does this Salvato+22 counterpart have an informative spec-z?
